user.title: Air Traffic Merge
user.description: Choose your FR24 sensor, ADS-B source (URL or entity), and tracking (callsign/registration).

fr24.title: FR24 Sensor
fr24.description: Select your Flightradar24 sensor (must have attribute `flights`).

adsb_source.title: ADS-B Source
adsb_source.description: Choose ADS-B via URL (aircraft.json) or an existing sensor entity.

adsb_entity.title: ADS-B Entity
adsb_entity.description: Select a sensor that provides an `aircraft` attribute.

tracking_values.title: Tracking Values
tracking_values.description: Separate multiple values with commas, e.g. `CHX16,CHX18` or `D-HXYZ,D-ABCD`.
